txt.en:
'Word has spread that the Orcs of Ânghum-maudhûl are preparing for a counter-attack against the Malledhrim. We must strike against them first, before they can muster their full strength.

'I will leave that to you, [placeholder]. Bring death to the enemies of the Malledhrim at Ânghum-maudhûl, then return to me with your report.

'Ânghum-maudhûl lies south-east of here, along the road.'
'Your quick action has granted the Malledhrim a reprieve. With the forces of Ânghum-maudhûl diminished, we do not expect a counter-attack until reinforcements arrive.'
'Seek out and defeat the Orcs of Ânghum-maudhûl. Go now!'
Word has spread that the Orcs in Ânghum-maudhûl are preparing for a viscious counter-attack against Mithechad and the Malledhrim.
Ânghum-maudhûl lies to the south-east of Mithechad.\n\nHarchador has asked you to defeat the Orcs of Ânghum-maudhûl before they can muster their full strength.
Harchador is at Mithechad, north-west of Ânghum-maudhûl.\n\nYou should speak with Harchador and let him know that you were victorious.
